persistanceModel

Class InternetReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • persistanceModel.InternetReceiver

  • public class InternetReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    This is a network Receiver. It listens for the connection changes the connection settings. WHen a change is detected, it will change the internal network status Based on Meow meo's post on: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3767591/check-intent-internet-connection

    eorod_000
